bibl.title: Late Antique Papyri from Hermopolis in the British Library I
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Lond. III, 1004 descr.; 1026(a) descr.; 1030 descr.; 1050 descr.; 1307 descr.
Amin Benaissa, Late Antique Papyri from Hermopolis in the British Library I.

1. P.Lond. III 1026(a) descr. Sale on Delivery of Hay. 12/13 January 482/497/527. - 2. P.Lond. III 1307 descr. Lease of Land. 30 September 509. - 3. P.Lond. III 1004 descr. Top of Contract. January - September 517. - 4. P.Lond. III 1030 descr. Lease of a Cow (?) with Rent in Cheese. c. 527. - 5. P.Lond. III 1050 descr. Lease of Land in the form of a μισθαποχή. Late 6th / early 7th c.
bibl.note: 1. P.Lond. III 1026(a) descr. Sale on Delivery of Hay. 12/13 January 482/497/527. - 2. P.Lond. III 1307 descr. Lease of Land. 30 September 509. - 3. P.Lond. III 1004 descr. Top of Contract. January - September 517. - 4. P.Lond. III 1030 descr. Lease of a Cow (?) with Rent in Cheese. c. 527. - 5. P.Lond. III 1050 descr. Lease of Land in the form of a μισθαποχή. Late 6th / early 7th c.
